0011.HK.summary: Hang Seng Bank Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides various banking and related financial services to individual, corporate, commercial, small and medium-sized enterprise, and institutional customers in Hong Kong, Mainland China, and internationally. It operates through four segments: Wealth and Personal Banking, Commercial Banking, Global Banking and Markets, and Other. The company offers personal banking services, including current and savings accounts, time deposits, mortgages and personal loans, credit cards, and insurance and wealth management services, as well as consumer lending services. It also provides corporate lending, trade and receivable finance, payments and cash management, treasury and foreign exchange, general insurance, key-person insurance, investment, and corporate wealth management services, as well as general banking, interest rate, foreign exchange, money market, structured, and derivative products, etc. In addition, the company offers retirement benefit, life assurance, fund management, and stock broking services, as well as index compilation and licensing; fund raising and sales; and asset management services. It operates approximately 290 service outlets in Hong Kong; branches in Macau and Singapore; and a representative office in Taipei. Hang Seng Bank Limited, through its subsidiary, Hang Seng Bank (China) Limited, operates a network of outlets in approximately 20 cities in Mainland China. The company was founded in 1933 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Hang Seng Bank Limited is a subsidiary of The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation Limited.

0030.HK.summary: Ban Loong Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the money lending, and trading of goods and commodities in Hong Kong and the People's Republic of China. The company operates through Money Lending and Trading Segments. It provides short-term personal and corporate loans; and trades in refined edible oil, sugar, cosmetic, and personal care products. The company was formerly known as ABC Communications (Holdings) Limited and changed its name to Ban Loong Holdings Limited in October 2015. Ban Loong Holdings Limited is based in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.

0033.HK.summary: Amber Hill Financial Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, primarily engages in the trading of party products, and metals and minerals in Hong Kong and North America. It trades in party accessories, decorations, cutlery, and eatery wares. The company also provides securities brokerage and asset management services. In addition, it is involved in the personal and corporate loans business; credit guarantee and investment activities; and trading of security products and provision of security services, as well as advancing business. The company was formerly known as China Cloud Copper Company Limited and changed its name to Amber Hill Financial Holdings Limited in July 2020. Amber Hill Financial Holdings Limited was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.

0064.HK.summary: Get Nice Holdings Limited engages in financial, property investment and development, money lending, and real estate brokerage service businesses. It provides mortgage financing, personal loans for professionals, and SME corporate loans; invests in industrial property, commercial shops and buildings, residential properties, and hotel property. The company also offers securities and futures broking services, securities margin financing services, placing and underwriting of securities, and corporate finance advisory services. In addition, it provides real estate broking services, including buy-and-sell and rental transactions in residential and commercial sectors in Hong Kong. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

0111.HK.summary: Cinda International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides asset management services in Hong Kong and Mainland China. The company operates through Asset Management, Sales and Trading Business, and Corporate Finance segments. The Asset Management segment provides advisory service and related auxiliary services on fund management, as well as other related proprietary investment services; and manages private funds. The Sales and Trading Business segment offers broking services in securities, equity linked products, unit trusts, stock options, and commodities and futures contracts, as well as underwriting, placing, and margin financing services to broking clients. This segment also acts as an agent for the sale of savings plans, general and life insurance, and other investment linked insurance products. The Corporate Finance segment offers corporate finance and advisory services on equity and debt financing to companies listed or seeking listing on Hong Kong or other stock exchanges; and other unlisted corporates. The company also offers fund management, financial planning, and private equity investment services; and administrative support, research, and consultancy services, as well as acts as a money lender. It serves individuals, corporates, enterprises, and institutional customers. The company was formerly known as Hantec Investment Holdings Limited and changed its name to Cinda International Holdings Limited in November 2008. Cinda International Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Cinda International Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Cinda Securities Co., Ltd.

0145.HK.summary: CCIAM Future Energy Limited, an investment holding company, primarily engages in the design and provision of energy saving solutions in Hong Kong, the People's Republic of China, and Taiwan. The company designs, installs, and implements ultra performance plant control systems, as well as offers after-sales services, including maintenance, and email and phone support services. It is also involved in the treasury investment and loan financing activities. The company was formerly known as The Hong Kong Building And Loan Agency Limited and changed its name to CCIAM Future Energy Limited in March 2021. CCIAM Future Energy Limited is based in North Point, Hong Kong.

0165.HK.summary: China Everbright Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the investment activities and provision of financial services in Hong Kong and Mainland China. The company invests in unlisted equity securities or equity derivatives, as well as in the areas of new economy, artificial intelligence and advanced manufacturing, new energy, medical care and senior healthcare, overseas acquisition and infrastructure, real estate, aircraft industry chain, mezzanine fund, and others. It also focuses on investing in aircraft leasing, artificial intelligence of things, and elderly care industry platforms; and investing in equity, debts, structured products, and other products. In addition, the company provides a range of financial services, including asset management, investment management, and investment advisory services related to absolute return funds, bond funds, and equity funds, as well as offers management, treasury management, secretarial, money lending, fund management, venture capital, leasing, and consultancy services. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hong Kong. China Everbright Limited is a subsidiary of Honorich Holdings Limited.

0174.HK.summary: Gemini Investments (Holdings) Limited, an investment holding company, engages in property investment and development, and other businesses in Hong Kong, the United States, and internationally. It leases office and residential properties; develops commercial and residential properties; and invests in various investment funds and securities. The company also invests in real estate fund platform. The company was formerly known as Gemini Property Investments Limited and changed its name to Gemini Investments (Holdings) Limited in July 2011. The company was incorporated in 1987 and is based in Central, Hong Kong.

0188.HK.summary: Sunwah Kingsway Capital Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides various financial services in Hong Kong, the People's Republic of China, and internationally. It operates through Proprietary Investment, Property Investment, Brokerage and Financing, Corporate Finance and Capital Markets, Asset Management, and Others segments. The Proprietary Investment segment invests in securities for treasury and liquidity management, as well as in structured deals, including listed and unlisted equities, debt securities, and investment funds. The Property Investment segment invests in properties for rental income. The Brokerage and Financing segment offers securities, options, funds, futures, and commodities brokerage services; and margin and other financing, factoring, and other related services. The Corporate Finance and Capital Markets segment provides financial advisory services to corporate clients; and acts as an underwriting and placing agent in the equity capital market. The Asset Management segment offers asset management and related advisory services to private equity funds and private clients. The Others segment provides management, administrative, and corporate secretarial services, as well as loan financing and leasing services. The company was formerly known as SW Kingsway Capital Holdings Limited and changed its name to Sunwah Kingsway Capital Holdings Limited in September 2011. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

0211.HK.summary: Styland Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the financial services, mortgage financing, property development and investment, and securities trading businesses in Hong Kong. The company's Financial Services segment offers securities and futures dealing, brokerage financing, corporate finance, asset management, and other financing services, as well as other equity and debt financing solutions. This segment also provides margin financing services for trading stocks and other listed securities, and for subscribing to new shares in initial public offerings; and stock broking and online stock trading services for Hong Kong listed companies, institutional investors, professionals, and individual investors. Its Mortgage Financing segment provides loans to individuals, corporations, and institutions that are secured by real properties. The company's Property Development and Investment segment is involved in the property redevelopment activities, as well as properties letting business. Its Securities Trading segment trades in securities and derivative products. The company also provides management and strategic investment services. Styland Holdings Limited was founded in 1977 and is based in Kwun Tong, Hong Kong.

0217.HK.summary: China Chengtong Development Group Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the bulk commodity trading, property development, leasing, hotel and marine recreation, and property investment businesses in the People's Republic of China. Its Bulk Commodity Trade segment engages in the trading of coal, steel, and non-ferrous metals. The company's Property Development segment holds land for property development projects. Its Leasing segment provides finance leasing services, including arranging sales and leaseback transactions, as well as operates lease services. The company's Marine Recreation Services and Hotel Segment provides hotel and marine recreation services. Its Property Investment segment provides rental services; and holds investment properties for appreciation. The company is based in Wan Chai, Hong Kong. China Chengtong Development Group Limited is a subsidiary of World Gain Holdings Limited.

0218.HK.summary: Shenwan Hongyuan (H.K.) Limited, an investment holding company, engages in brokerage, corporate finance, asset management, financing and loan, and investment and other businesses in Hong Kong. The company operates in five segments: Enterprise Finance, Personal Finance and Wealth Management, Institutional Services and Trading, Investment Management, and Others. It offers stock underwriting sponsor, bond underwriting, and financial advisory services for corporate clients; and external equity investment, debt investment, other investments, and structured financing solutions. The company also provides securities, futures, and options brokerage services; and wealth management, OTC, and securities margin financing products to individual customers and non-professional institutional investors. In addition, it provides stock brokerage and trading services; research advisory, and investment and financing solutions; and sales, trading, hedging, and over-the-counter derivative services to institutional clients, as well as sells and trades in fixed income bonds, currencies, and commodities. Further, the company offers asset management, investment advisory, and public and private fund management services. Additionally, it offers management and treasury, and share custodian and nominee services; leases computer equipment; and holds properties. The company was formerly known as Shenyin Wanguo (H.K.) Limited and changed its name to Shenwan Hongyuan (H.K.) Limited in May 2015. Shenwan Hongyuan (H.K.) Limited was incorporated in 1972 and is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.

0223.HK.summary: Elife Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides commodities trading and esmart digital services in China, Hong Kong, and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Unconventional Gas Business, Commodities Trading Business, and Esmart Digital Services. It offers unconventional gas related services, as well as imports technical equipment for the unconventional gas industry; and commodities trading and agency services. The company also provides cloud data smart platform and commercial terminals for shop management. It serves retail stores, convenience stores, small-to-medium sized supermarkets, gas stations, pharmacies, tobacco and wine specialty shops, China Post network, small servicing spots, apparel chain stores, etc. The company was formerly known as Sino Resources Group Limited and changed its name to Elife Holdings Limited in November 2016. Elife Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Hong Kong, Hong Kong.

0245.HK.long_name: China Vered Financial Holding Corporation Limited
0245.HK.summary: China Vered Financial Holding Corporation Limited, an investment holding company, provides asset management, consultancy, financing, and securities advisory and brokerage services. It also provides insurance agency and money lending services. The company was formerly known as China Minsheng Financial Holding Corporation Limited and changed its name to China Vered Financial Holding Corporation Limited in July 2020. China Vered Financial Holding Corporation Limited is based in Causeway Bay, Hong Kong.

0281.HK.summary: Rivera (Holdings) Limited, an investment holding company, engages in property development and investment, and securities trading and investment businesses in Hong Kong, Macau, and Mainland China. The company develops, sells, and leases residential and commercial cum-office development projects; and holds, sells, and leases approximately 300 car parking spaces. It also provides investment management services. The company was incorporated in 1964 and is based in Central, Hong Kong. Rivera (Holdings) Limited is considered a Red Chip company due to its listing on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange.

0299.HK.summary: Glory Sun Land Group Limited, an investment holding company, engages in property development and investment business in the People's Republic of China. It operates through Yacht Club; Training; Real Estate and Property Investment; Trading of Commodities; Construction; and Others segments. The company also operates a yacht club and golf practice court, children playrooms, and fitness rooms; provides training services; and trades in commodities, seafood, and home appliances. It also involved in the provision of construction works. The company was formerly known as New Sports Group Limited and changed its name to Glory Sun Land Group Limited in September 2015. Glory Sun Land Group Limited was founded in 1995 and is based in Admiralty, Hong Kong.

0310.HK.summary: Prosperity Investment Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, principally engages in securities and equity-related investments business in the People's Republic of China. The company focuses on investment targets in infrastructure, mine and resources, property, retail, and service sectors. It also provides management services. The company is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.

0335.HK.summary: Upbest Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides a range of financial services primarily in Hong Kong and Macau. The company operates through seven segments: Broking, Financing, Corporate Finance, Assets Management, Property Investment, Precious Metal Trading, and Investment Holding. Its activities include securities and futures brokerage; securities margin financing and money lending; corporate finance advisory, placing, and underwriting; assets management for listed and unlisted companies, and high net worth individuals; precious metal trading; and share investments. The company is also involved in the property rental, management, and related businesses. Upbest Group Limited was founded in 1988 and is based in Central, Hong Kong. Upbest Group Limited is a subsidiary of CCAA Group Limited.

0376.HK.summary: Yunfeng Financial Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides insurance products in Hong Kong and Macau. The company operates in two segments, Insurance Products, and Other Financial Services and Corporate. It provides life and medical insurance, annuities, pension, and mandatory provident fund schemes. The company also provides fund and asset management services, as well as financing and investing solutions; and corporate advisory, and securities placing and underwriting advisory services. In addition, it engages in the provision of employee stock ownership plan administration and principal investment. Further, the company provides administrative, trustee, and general services; agency services to non-life insurers; marketing and promoting products, and public relations services; Internet and multimedia systems, and application development services; and technological development of computer software and hardware, technical consulting, technology services, and database and computer network services. The company was formerly known as REORIENT GROUP LIMITED and changed its name to Yunfeng Financial Group Limited in October 2016. The company was incorporated in 1982 and is based in Central, Hong Kong. Yunfeng Financial Group Limited is a subsidiary of Yunfeng Financial Holdings Limited.

0388.HK.long_name: Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing Limited
0388.HK.summary: Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing Limited, together with its subsidiaries, owns and operates stock exchanges and futures exchanges, and related clearing houses in Hong Kong, Mainland China, and the United Kingdom. It operates through five segments: Cash, Equity and Financial Derivatives, Commodities, Post Trade, and Technology. The Cash segment covers various equity products traded on the cash market platforms of the Stock Exchange of Hong Kong Limited, the Shanghai Stock Exchange, and the Shenzhen Stock Exchange; sale of market data relating to the products; and other related activities. The Equity and Financial Derivatives segment provides and maintains trading platforms for a range of equity and financial derivative products, such as stock and equity index futures and options, derivative warrants, and callable bull/bear contracts and warrants, as well as sells related market data. The Commodities segment operates an exchange for the trading of base, ferrous, and precious metals futures and options contracts in the United Kingdom; and operates Qianhai Mercantile Exchange Co., Ltd., a commodity trading platform in the Mainland. This segment also covers commodities contracts traded on Futures Exchange. The Post Trade segment operates clearing houses that are responsible for clearing, settlement, depository, custodian, and nominee services. The Technology segment offers various services that provide users with access to the platform and infrastructure. The company serves issuers and investors. Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing Limited is based in Central, Hong Kong.

0412.HK.long_name: China Shandong Hi-Speed Financial Group Limited
0412.HK.summary: China Shandong Hi-Speed Financial Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides various financial services in the People's Republic of China. The company operates through four segments: Investments in Securities, Money Lending, Financial Leasing, and Financial Technology. The Investments in Securities segment purchases and sells securities and derivatives; and holds equity and debt investments. The Money Lending segment provides money lending and advisory services. The Financial Leasing segment primarily is involved in the provision of direct financial leasing and advisory services, as well as operation of an asset trading platform. The Financial Technology segment offers online investment and technology enabled lending services; and online new media services. It also provides corporate, business factoring, securities brokerage, asset management, financial investments, investment management, and related financial services; and issues guaranteed bonds and perpetual securities. The company was formerly known as China Innovative Finance Group Limited and changed its name to China Shandong Hi-Speed Financial Group Limited in October 2017. China Shandong Hi-Speed Financial Group Limited is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.

0428.HK.summary: Cocoon Holdings Limited is a principal investment firm specializing in investments in listed and unlisted companies. The firm typically invests in the fields of resources, technology enabled manufacturing, food and retail and healthcare. It also offers other investment services that include money market instruments, capital syndication, and arranging strategic corporate deals, with an emphasis on financial restructuring and capital infusion. The firm invests in Asia and the Greater China region. Cocoon Holdings Limited, formerly known as Huge China Holdings Limited, was founded in 1993 and is based in Hong Kong with additional office in Hamilton, Bermuda.

0440.HK.summary: Dah Sing Financial Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides banking, insurance, financial, and other related services in the People's Republic of China. The company operates through Personal Banking, Commercial Banking, Treasury, Overseas Banking, and Insurance Business segments. The Personal Banking segment accepts various deposits from individual customers; and provides residential mortgage loans, personal loans, overdrafts, vehicle financing, and credit card services, as well as insurance sales and investment services. The Commercial Banking segment accepts various deposits; and offers loans and working capital financing to commercial, industrial, and institutional customers, as well as trade financing services. The Treasury segment provides foreign exchange services; cash management services for deposit taking and lending; and interest rate risk management services. It also manages investment in securities. The Overseas Banking segment offers personal and commercial banking products and services. The Insurance Business segment is involved in the insurance and pension fund management business. The company also provides insurance agency, nominee, and securities dealing services; and invest in properties. The company was formerly known as Fivetech Investments Limited and changed its name to Dah Sing Financial Holdings Limited in July 1987. Dah Sing Financial Holdings Limited was incorporated in 1987 and is based in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.

0508.HK.summary: Dingyi Group Investment Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the loan financing and financial leasing businesses in the Mainland China and Hong Kong. The company is also involved in the sale of food and beverages; securities trading; and properties development businesses. In addition, it engages in the trading of wine; investment advisory; and restaurant operation businesses. The company was formerly known as Chevalier Pacific Holdings Limited and changed its name to Dingyi Group Investment Limited in February 2012. The company is based in Wanchai, Hong Kong.

0575.HK.summary: Regent Pacific Group Limited, an investment holding company, holds investments in the healthcare and life sciences companies in China, Europe, Hong Kong, and Taiwan. It operates in two segments, Biopharma and Corporate Investment. The company engages in the research, development, manufacture, marketing, and sale of pharmaceutical products for the treatment and management of urological disorders; and development of artificial intelligence (ÂAIÂ) systems to track the rate of aging at the molecular, cellular, tissue, organ, system, physiological, and psychological levels. The company also invests in listed and unlisted corporate entities. In addition, it provides management and corporate finance services. Regent Pacific Group Limited was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

0612.HK.summary: China Ding Yi Feng Holdings Limited is a publicly owned investment manager. The firm invests in the private equity, and venture capital markets across the globe. The firm also invests in e-commerce & internet services and high technology industry. The firm seeks to invest in listed and unlisted companies in the PRC and Hong Kong. The firm employs a combination of quantitative and qualitative analysis to create its investment portfolios. It was formerly known as China Investment Fund International Holdings Limited. China Ding Yi Feng Holdings Limited was established in 2001 and is based in Wanchai, Hong Kong.

0613.HK.summary: Planetree International Development Limited, an investment holding company, engages in treasury management, financial, and money lending businesses in Hong Kong. The company is involved in trading and holding debt and equity securities; financing and securities investment activities; property leasing; dealing in futures contracts; and securities investment activities. It also offers corporate management services; securities brokerage and financial services; and asset management services. The company was formerly known as Yugang International Limited and changed its name to Planetree International Development Limited in July 2019. Planetree International Development Limited is headquartered in North Point, Hong Kong.

0622.HK.summary: Oshidori International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides financial services in Hong Kong. It offers securities brokerage, placing and underwriting, consultancy and corporate finance advisory, money lending, investment advisory, asset management, margin financing, and trading services, as well as engages in trading and investment of securities. The company also provides credit and lending services; and holds yachts and motor vehicles. The company was formerly known as Enerchina Holdings Limited and changed its name to Oshidori International Holdings Limited in April 2019. Oshidori International Holdings Limited is based in North Point, Hong Kong.

0628.HK.summary: Gome Finance Technology Co., Ltd., an investment holding company, provides various financial services in Hong Kong and the People's Republic of China. The company offers commercial factoring, financial leasing, personal property pawn loans, real estate mortgage loans, and money lending services. It also provides consultancy services. The company was formerly known as Sino Credit Holdings Limited and changed its name to Gome Finance Technology Co., Ltd. in February 2017. The company was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Gome Finance Technology Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Swiree Capital Limited.

0665.HK.summary: Haitong International Securities Group Limited provides financial products and services to corporate, institutional, and retail clients worldwide. The Wealth Management segment offers financial services and investment solutions to retail and high net-worth clients. This segment engages in securities broking and dealing, futures, and options contracts; foreign exchange trading; over the counter products and risk management instruments sales; securities margin financing; and the provision of investment advisory, financial planning, and investment funds distribution services, as well and custodian services. The Corporate Finance segment provides sponsoring and underwriting services for fund raising activities in equity and debt capital markets. This segment also provides advisory services and financing solutions for corporate actions, such as mergers and acquisitions, assets restructuring, etc. The Asset Management segment offers investment management services, including public funds, private funds, and mandatory provident funds to individual, corporate, and institutional clients. The Institutional Clients segment provides cash equities sales and trading; brokerage; stock borrowing and lending; equity research; investment and financing solutions; and financial instruments, such as fixed income products, currency and commodity products, futures and options, exchange traded funds, and derivative products in financial centers for institutional clients. The Investment segment invests in investment funds and private equity investments. The company was formerly known as Taifook Securities Group Limited and changed its name to Haitong International Securities Group Limited in November 2010. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Haitong International Securities Group Limited is as a subsidiary of Haitong International Holdings Limited

0668.HK.summary: Doyen International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides loan financing services in the People's Republic of China. The company operates through Investment Property Holding, Dongkui Business, Sales of Flowers and Plants, and Distressed Assets Management segments. It is also involved in the investment and rental of properties. The company owns Dong Dong Mall, a shopping arcade with a total gross floor area of 18,043.45 square meters located in Chongqing. In addition, it provides management and distressed asset management services; and sells flowers, seedlings, and plants. The company was formerly known as Dowell Property Holdings Limited and changed its name to in Doyen International Holdings Limited in June 2016. Doyen International Holdings Limited was incorporated in 1990 and is based in Wanchai, Hong Kong. Doyen International Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Money Success Limited.

0717.HK.summary: Emperor Capital Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides a range of financial services in Hong Kong, the United States, and internationally. The company operates through Financing, Brokerage, Placing and Underwriting, and Corporate Finance segments. It offers commercial and personal loans comprising short-term unsecured loans, such as tax loans, bridging loans, term loans, and personal loans, as well as long-term secured loans, including property mortgage loans; and margin and initial public offering (IPO) financing. The company also provides brokerage services for securities, futures, and options traded on the exchanges in Hong Kong, Mainland China, and overseas countries; wealth management services, such as providing advice regarding an array of investment services, including securities, mutual funds, insurance-linked products, and real estate investment; asset management services; and discretionary investment services. In addition, it offers placing and underwriting services, as well as acts as a placing agents and underwriters for various Hong Kong listed companies; and corporate finance advisory services on takeovers code related transactions and undertakes sponsor work for IPOs, as well as provides advisory for corporate transactions, including placing, rights issue, corporate restructuring, and merger and acquisition services. Further, the company provides promotion and marketing, and insurance and other brokerage services. Emperor Capital Group Limited was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Wanchai, Hong Kong. Emperor Capital Group Limited is a subsidiary of Emperor Capital Group Holdings Limited.

0730.HK.summary: Shougang Concord Grand (Group) Limited, an investment holding company, provides finance leasing and other financial services in Mainland China and Hong Kong. It operates through three divisions: Finance Leasing and Other Financial Services, Property Leasing and Building Management Services, and Assets Management. The company offers finance leasing for various sectors, including energy, transport, printing equipment, medical equipment, scientific and technical equipment, industrial equipment, etc. It is also involved in the investment, leasing, sale, and management of properties, such as industrial, office, and residential buildings; provision of property consultant, administrative and management, and referral and corporate financial advisory services; and investment and management of industrial funds. Shougang Concord Grand (Group) Limited has a strategic cooperation agreement with Jingdong Digits Technology Holding Co., Ltd. for cooperation in the field of supply chain business. The company is based in Wan Chai, Hong Kong. Shougang Concord Grand (Group) Limited is a subsidiary of Wheeling Holdings Limited.

0764.HK.summary: Eternity Investment Limited, an investment holding company, primarily engages in the sale of financial assets and money lending businesses. The company operates in four segments: Property Investment, Sale of Financial Assets, Money Lending, and Sale of Jewelry Products. It also designs and sells jewelry products; and leases rental properties. In addition, the company manages membership-based golf club and resort that provides recreational and wellness services; provides property development and property management services; and manages and operates cultural forum and related cultural activities. It operates in Hong Kong, Australia, Europe, the People's Republic of China, and the United States. The company was formerly known as China Star Investment Holdings Limited and changed its name to Eternity Investment Limited in June 2010. Eternity Investment Limited was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

0804.HK.summary: Pinestone Capital Limited, an investment holding company, provides bespoke financial services to individual and corporate clients in Hong Kong. It offers securities brokerage services; securities-backed lending services, including margin financing and money lending services; and placing and underwriting services. The company was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Pinestone Capital Limited is a subsidiary of HCC & Co Limited.

0821.HK.summary: Value Convergence Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides financial services in Hong Kong. It operates through five segments: Brokerage and Financing, Corporate Finance and Other Advisory, Asset Management, Insurance Brokerage, and Proprietary Trading. The company offers securities, as well as futures and options brokering and dealing; and margin financing and money lending; placing and underwriting;, as well as trades in equity and debt securities, futures, options, derivatives, and structured products. It also provides mergers and acquisitions, research, insurance brokerage, asset management, financial advisory, and company secretarial services. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Wanchai, Hong Kong.

0900.HK.summary: AEON Credit Service (Asia) Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the consumer finance business primarily in Hong Kong. It operates through three segments: Credit Cards, Personal Loans, and Insurance. The Credit Card segment offers credit card services to individuals; and acquiring services for member stores. The Personal Loans segment provides personal loan financing services to individuals. The Insurance segment offers insurance agency and brokerage services. It also provides card payment processing and microfinance services. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong. AEON Credit Service (Asia) Company Limited is a subsidiary of AEON Financial Service (Hong Kong) Co., Limited.

0905.HK.summary: Global Mastermind Capital Limited is a publicly owned investment manager. Global Mastermind Capital Limited is based in Central, Hong Kong.

0913.HK.summary: Unity Investments Holdings, Ltd. and its subsidiaries engage primarily in investment holding in listed and unlisted companies. The firm invests in both listed and unlisted companies, and the current core portfolio comprises of mainly small to medium sized listed companies. It invests in a wide array of industries and sectors like securities investment companies and companies engaging in the businesses of infrastructure, manufacturing, trading, information technologies, media, energy, property investment and securities investment. Unity Investments Holdings, Ltd. is based in Hong Kong.

0952.HK.summary: China Tonghai International Financial Limited, an investment holding company, provides various financial services in Hong Kong. It operates through Brokerage and Interest Income, Corporate Finance, Asset Management, Investments, and Others segments. The Brokerage and Interest Income segment provides discretionary and non-discretionary dealing services for securities, futures, and options; margin financing and money lending services; and insurance broking and wealth management services, as well as earns interest income from debt instruments. The corporate finance offers securities placing, underwriting, and corporate finance and general advisory services. The Asset Management segment provides fund management, discretionary portfolio management, and portfolio management advisory services. The Investments segment invests in and trades in various investment products. The Others segment offers financial media services. It also provides import/export trading, and Website management and other related services. The company was formerly known as China Oceanwide International Financial Limited and changed its name to China Tonghai International Financial Limited in May 2018. China Tonghai International Financial Limited was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. China Tonghai International Financial Limited is a subsidiary of Oceanwide Holdings International Financial Development Co., Ltd.

0966.HK.long_name: China Taiping Insurance Holdings Company Limited
0966.HK.summary: China Taiping Insurance Holdings Company Limited, an investment holding company, underwrites direct life insurance, property and casualty insurance, and various classes of reinsurance products in Hong Kong, Macau, and internationally. It operates through Life Insurance Business, PRC Property and Casualty Insurance Business, Overseas Property and Casualty Insurance Business, Reinsurance Business, Pension and Group Life Insurance Business, and Other Businesses segments. The company's life insurance products include individual and group life insurance, health insurance, accident insurance, and annuity. Its property and casualty insurance products comprise compulsory motor insurance; and liability insurance, credit insurance, guarantee insurance, and short-term accident and health insurance, as well as related reinsurance products. The company's reinsurance portfolio covers property damage, life, marine cargo and hull, and miscellaneous non-marine classes. The company is also involved in the pension, assets management, insurance intermediary, financial leasing, property investment, securities dealing and broking, and elderly care investment businesses; and manages investment funds. In addition, it provides back to back financing arrangement, and insurance broking and agency services. The company was formerly known as China Insurance International Holdings Company Limited and changed its name to China Taiping Insurance Holdings Company Limited in August 2009. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in North Point, Hong Kong. China Taiping Insurance Holdings Company Limited is a subsidiary of China Taiping Insurance Group (HK) Company Limited.

0993.HK.summary: Huarong International Financial Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides financial services in Hong Kong and the People's Republic of China. The company operates through Securities, Corporate Finance, and Asset Management and Direct Investment segments. The Securities segment engages in the broking and dealing of securities, futures, and options contracts; and provision of margin financing services. The Corporate Finance segment offers securities underwriting and sponsoring, and financial advisory services to institutional clients. The Asset Management and Direct Investment segment provides asset management services; and makes direct investments in equities, bonds, funds, derivative instruments, and other financial products. Huarong International Financial Holdings Limited also offers sub-leasing arrangement, money lending, and consultancy services. The company was formerly known as Simsen International Corporation Limited and changed its name to Huarong International Financial Holdings Limited in October 2015. The company is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Huarong International Financial Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Camellia Pacific Investment Holding Limited.

1004.HK.long_name: China Smarter Energy Group Holdings Limited
1004.HK.summary: China Smarter Energy Group Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the solar energy business in the People's Republic of China. The company operates through four segments: Clean Energy, Trading in Securities, Investments, and Trading of Bulk Commodities. It operates solar power plants and distributed solar power stations. As of December 31, 2019, the company had generated electricity volume of 356,940 megawatt hours. It also trades in listed equity securities; and invests in unlisted equities. In addition, the company trades in solid, liquid, and gaseous fuels, as well as other related products; and bulk commodities derivatives. The company was formerly known as Rising Development Holdings Limited and changed its name to China Smarter Energy Group Holdings Limited in February 2015. China Smarter Energy Group Holdings Limited was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.

1031.HK.summary: Kingston Financial Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides a range of financial services in Hong Kong and Macau. The company operates through Securities Brokerage, Underwriting, and Placements; Margin and Initial Public Offering (IPO) Financing; Other Financial Services; Hotel Operations; Food and Beverage; Gaming; and Securities Investment segments. It offers brokerage, underwriting, and placements services for dealings in securities on stock exchanges; margin and IPO financing; and corporate finance advisory, futures brokerage, and asset management services. The company also operates hotels and restaurants, as well as casinos in hotels; and trades in listed securities. As of March 31, 2020, it had 69 tables in the mass market halls, 15 tables in the VIP rooms, and 262 slot machines. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Central, Hong Kong. Kingston Financial Group Limited is a subsidiary of Active Dynamic Limited.

1104.HK.summary: APAC Resources Limited, an investment holding company, engages in commodity trading and natural resource investment businesses in the People's Republic of China. It operates through Commodity Business; Resource Investment; and Principal Investment and Financial Services segments. The company trades and invests in listed and unlisted securities; provides loan financing services; and invest in loan notes, convertible notes, and other financial assets, as well as invests in and develops mineral resources. It also provides management services; consultancy services in corporate management; and metallurgy technology services. APAC Resources Limited is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.

1140.HK.summary: Wealthking Investments Limited operates as an investment holding company in Hong Kong. The company develops customized investment solutions. It also focuses on developing partnerships with financial players to build a finance services platform. It focuses on companies with high potential for growth. The company typically invests in companies in medical, finance, TMT and health sectors. The company was formerly known as OP Financial Limited and changed its name to Wealthking Investments Limited in October 2020. Wealthking Investments Limited was founded in 2002 and is based in Cayman Islands with an additional office in Hong Kong.

1141.HK.summary: CMBC Capital Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides loan financing services primarily in Hong Kong. It operates through Securities; Investment and Financing; and Asset Management, Corporate Finance and Advisory segments. The Securities segment offers brokerage, securities margin financing, futures and options contracts dealing, and securities underwriting/placing services. The Investment and Financing segment invests and trades in equity and debt securities, bonds, and funds. The Asset Management and Advisory segment provides asset management, sponsorship, and financial advisory and arrangement services. It also offers corporate financing services. The company was formerly known as Skyway Securities Group Limited and changed its name to CMBC Capital Holdings Limited in May 2017. The company is headquartered in Kowloon, Hong Kong. CMBC Capital Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of CMBC International Investment Limited.

1319.HK.long_name: Oi Wah Pawnshop Credit Holdings Limited
1319.HK.summary: Oi Wah Pawnshop Credit Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the provision of secured financing services to high-net-worth customers in Hong Kong. It offers mortgage and pawn loans, and money lending services, as well as consulting services. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong. Oi Wah Pawnshop Credit Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Kwan Lik Holding Limited.

1469.HK.summary: Get Nice Financial Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides financial services in Hong Kong. It operates through three segments: Broking, Securities Margin Financing, and Corporate Finance. The company offers securities dealing and broking, futures and options broking, and underwriting and placement services; securities margin financing; and corporate finance and advisory services. In addition, it is involved in the provision of asset management services, as well as property and yacht holding activities. The company is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Get Nice Financial Group Limited operates as a subsidiary of Get Nice Holdings Limited.

1788.HK.summary: Guotai Junan International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides wealth management, brokerage, corporate finance, asset management, loans and financing, financial products, and market making and investment services in Hong Kong and internationally. The company's Brokerage segment is involved in securities, futures, options, and leveraged foreign exchange dealing and brokerage; and the provision of insurance brokerage services. Its Corporate Finance segment provides advisory services; and placing and underwriting services of debt and equity securities. The company's Asset Management segment offers asset management services comprising fund management and investment advisory services. Its Loans and Financing segment provides margin financing products, securities borrowing and lending to margin customers, initial public offering loans, other loans to customers, and bank deposits. The company's Financial Products, Market Making and Investments segment offers funds, fixed income securities, and equity investments, as well as structuring of financial products; and trades in and markets debt securities, exchange traded funds, and derivatives. Its Other segment provides information channel services. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Central, Hong Kong. Guotai Junan International Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Guotai Junan Holdings Limited.

2003.HK.summary: VCREDIT Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides online consumer finance services to prime and near-prime borrowers in China. The company offers credit card balance transfer and consumption credit products. It also provides loan facilitation, guarantee, micro credit, and financial leasing services, as well as technology services. The company was formerly known as Vision Capital Group Limited. VCREDIT Holdings Limited was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Admiralty, Hong Kong.

2263.HK.summary: Fu Shek Financial Holdings Limited, through its subsidiary, Sinomax Securities Limited provides securities trading, placing, and underwriting services in the People's Republic of China. It offers securities dealing, brokerage, and ancillary services; and margin financing and investment advisory services. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Admiralty, Hong Kong.

2356.HK.summary: Dah Sing Banking Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides banking, financial, and other related services in Hong Kong, Macau, and the People's Republic of China. It operates through Personal Banking, Commercial Banking, Treasury, and Overseas Banking segments. The Personal Banking segment accepts deposits from individual customers; and provides residential mortgage lending, personal loans, overdrafts, vehicle financing, and credit card services, as well as insurance sales and investment services. The Commercial Banking segment accepts deposits; offers loans and working capital financing to commercial, industrial, and institutional customers; and provides trade financing services. The Treasury segment provides foreign exchange services; cash management services for deposit taking and lending; and interest rate risk management services, as well as manages investments in securities. The Overseas Banking segment engages in the personal banking and commercial banking business activities in Macau and the People's Republic of China. The company is also involved in the property investment and securities dealing activities; and provision of nominee services. As of December 31, 2020, it had a branch network of 45 retail branches, 28 VIP centers, and 32 securities trading centers. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Wan Chai, Hong Kong. Dah Sing Banking Group Limited operates as a subsidiary of Dah Sing Financial Holdings Limited.

2680.HK.summary: Innovax Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates as a financial and securities services provider in Hong Kong. It offers corporate finance advisory services, such as IPO sponsorship, financial and independent financial advisory, and compliance advisory services; and securities dealing and brokerage services. The company also provides securities financing services, including margin financing for purchasing securities on the secondary market, as well as IPO financing for subscribing shares offered under public tranche of IPOs; and asset management services comprising fund and discretionary account management services, as well as future dealing services. In addition, it acts as a placing or sub-placing agent for the issue of new shares by listed companies; and global coordinator or bookrunner or lead manager or underwriter for IPOs of listing applicants. The company was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong. Innovax Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Billion Shine International Investment Limited.

3329.HK.summary: BOCOM International Holdings Company Limited, an investment holding company, provides securities and related financial services in Hong Kong and Mainland China. It operates through Brokerage, Corporate Finance and Underwriting, Asset Management and Advisory, Margin Financing, and Investment and Loans segments. The Brokerage segment trades in stocks, bonds, futures, options, and other marketable securities. The Corporate Finance and Underwriting segment provides corporate finance services, including equity underwriting, debt underwriting, sponsor services, and financial advisory services to institutional clients. The Asset Management and Advisory segment offers traditional asset management products and services to third party clients; and investment advisory, portfolio management, and transaction execution services. The Margin Financing segment provides securities-backed financial leverage for retail and institutional clients. The Investment and Loans segment engages in direct investment business, including investments in various debt and equity securities, investment in companies, and investment in loans. The company was formerly known as BOCOM Securities Company Limited and changed its name to BOCOM International Holdings Company Limited in May 2007. BOCOM International Holdings Company Limited was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. BOCOM International Holdings Company Limited is a subsidiary of Bank of Communications Co., Ltd.

3623.HK.long_name: China Success Finance Group Holdings Limited
3623.HK.summary: China Success Finance Group Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides financial and non-financial guarantee, financial leasing, and financial consultancy services in the People's Republic of China. The company offers financial guarantees, such as corporate financial, individual credit, financial leasing equipment, trusteeship, joint bond, corporate bond issuance, non-financing, and performance guarantees, as well as letter of guarantee for construction, and financing/financial consultancy and financial technology services. It also provides asset management services, including investment and financing management, asset/debt restructuring, special asset acquisition, corporate financial management, and financial consultancy services. In addition, the company offers fund management services for asset management, investment advisories, and private equity funds; investment and acquisition; capital; real estate finance; and micro credit services. Further, it provides financial leasing services comprising direct leasing, sale-leaseback, trusted leasing, joint leasing, and bank factoring. China Success Finance Group Holdings Limited was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Wanchai, Hong Kong.

3848.HK.summary: Wealthy Way Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides financial leasing, factoring, and advisory services to individual and companies in the People's Republic of China and Hong Kong. The company operates through Money Lending and Securities Dealing segments. It offers small loans and related loan facilitation, asset management, investment management and advisory, and securities dealing and broking, as well as money lending services. The company also offers sale-leaseback services. It serves airline companies, health care service providers, and energy saving equipment providers. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Wanchai, Hong Kong. Wealthy Way Group Limited is a subsidiary of Wealthy Rise Investment Limited.

4C3.F.summary: CMBC Capital Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides loan financing services primarily in Hong Kong. It operates through Securities; Investment and Financing; and Asset Management, Corporate Finance and Advisory segments. The Securities segment offers brokerage, securities margin financing, futures and options contracts dealing, and securities underwriting/placing services. The Investment and Financing segment invests and trades in equity and debt securities, bonds, and funds. The Asset Management and Advisory segment provides asset management, sponsorship, and financial advisory and arrangement services. It also offers corporate financing services. The company was formerly known as Skyway Securities Group Limited and changed its name to CMBC Capital Holdings Limited in May 2017. The company is headquartered in Kowloon, Hong Kong. CMBC Capital Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of CMBC International Investment Limited.

597.F.summary: BOCOM International Holdings Company Limited, an investment holding company, provides securities and related financial services in Hong Kong and Mainland China. It operates through Brokerage, Corporate Finance and Underwriting, Asset Management and Advisory, Margin Financing, and Investment and Loans segments. The Brokerage segment trades in stocks, bonds, futures, options, and other marketable securities. The Corporate Finance and Underwriting segment provides corporate finance services, including equity underwriting, debt underwriting, sponsor services, and financial advisory services to institutional clients. The Asset Management and Advisory segment offers traditional asset management products and services to third party clients; and investment advisory, portfolio management, and transaction execution services. The Margin Financing segment provides securities-backed financial leverage for retail and institutional clients. The Investment and Loans segment engages in direct investment business, including investments in various debt and equity securities, investment in companies, and investment in loans. The company was formerly known as BOCOM Securities Company Limited and changed its name to BOCOM International Holdings Company Limited in May 2007. BOCOM International Holdings Company Limited was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. BOCOM International Holdings Company Limited is a subsidiary of Bank of Communications Co., Ltd.

616A.F.summary: Diginex Limited, a digital asset financial services and advisory company, provides products, architecture, and infrastructure for the financial markets in the areas of digital asset ecosystem in Singapore and internationally. The company operates EQUOS, a cryptocurrency exchange for the professional and individual investors; an over-the-counter trading platform; Digivault, a hot and cold custodian platform for the custody of digital assets for institutional investors; and Diginex Access, a front-to-back integrated trading platform that provides trading and portfolio management solutions to institutional and professional retail clients. It also provides asset management services under the Bletchley Park Asset Management name; and securitization advisory, origination, and distribution services. The company was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

6877.HK.summary: CLSA Premium Limited, an investment holding company, provides leveraged foreign exchange, trading, cash dealing, and other services. It offers commodity and index trading, and margin dealing services, as well as precious metals trading and settlement services. The company also provides securities brokerage and management services. It primarily operates in Hong Kong, New Zealand, Australia, and the People's Republic of China. The company was formerly known as KVB Kunlun Financial Group Limited and changed its name to CLSA Premium Limited in November 2019. CLSA Premium Limited was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Kowloon, Hong Kong. CLSA Premium Limited is a subsidiary of Citic Securities Overseas Investment Company Limited.

6JY.F.summary: Duddell Street Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. It intends to effect a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses or entities. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Central, Hong Kong.

8019.HK.summary: Hao Wen Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in money lending business in the People's Republic of China, Hong Kong, and internationally. The company also engages in the processing and trading of electronic parts; and manufacture and trading of biomass fuel products. It is also involved in the sale of burial plots and related services; and provision of cemetery maintenance services. Hao Wen Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Sheung Wan, Hong Kong.

8063.HK.summary: Global Mastermind Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the travel business in Singapore, Hong Kong, and Malaysia. It operates through six segments: Travel Business, Treasury Management Business, Money Lending Business, Brokerage Business, Asset Management Business, and Corporate Finance Advisory Business. The company offers travel-related products and services, including reservation of air tickets and hotel rooms, as well as arrangement of packaged tours. It also provides money lending, treasury management, property holding, and management services; and financial services, such as securities brokerage, margin financing, initial public offering (IPO) financing, asset management, and corporate finance advisory services, as well as deals in futures and securities. The company was formerly known as Well Way Group Limited and changed its name to Global Mastermind Holdings Limited in December 2015. Global Mastermind Holdings Limited is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

8071.HK.summary: China Netcom Technology Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides financial technology services in the People's Republic of China. It operates through Smart Retail Business, Financial Technology Services, Lottery Business, and Sports Training Business segments. The Financial Technology Services Business segment offers credit referral and services, such as credit facilitation, post-origination, and financial guarantee services. The Smart Retail Business segment provides distribution, maintenance, and technical support for omni-channel payment devices and software applications; software development services; and technical consultancy services for cloud server service, internet of things and SMS traffic service. The Lottery Business segment develops computer software, hardware, and application system, as well as provides self-developed technology and related technical consultancy services to the operating system sector of lottery market. The Sports Training Business segment provides sports training services. The company also offers asset management services; and consultation and result transfer on network technology and computer network engineering services. The company was formerly known as China Metal Resources Holdings Limited and changed its name to China Netcom Technology Holdings Limited in January 2011. China Netcom Technology Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Hong Kong, Hong Kong.

8072.HK.summary: Roma Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides valuation and technical advisory services in Hong Kong. The company offers valuation services for business and intangible assets, such as business contracts, mining and exploration rights, customer relationships, franchises, distribution and publicity rights, technology and software applications, trademarks, patents, copyrights, domain names, Websites, and publication rights; and natural resources valuation and technical advisory services, including exploration planning, project feasibility study, resource estimation, evaluation, environmental and social, and risk management services. It also provides valuation services for financial instruments comprising accumulators/decumulators, call and put options, convertible bonds, convertible preference shares, equity-linked investments, financial guarantees, forward/futures contracts, share options, structured products, swap contracts, and warrants; property valuation services for various types of properties; credit and risk evaluation services; biological assets valuation services; and purchase price allocation services, as well as various services for clients' antiques, work of art, and collectables. In addition, the company offers machineries and equipment valuation services for manufacturing processes and industrial facility installations; various technical advisory services; and corporate advisory services, such as business planning, feasibility studies, fairness opinions, risk control and management, alliance with other professional parties, advisory before issuance of financial instruments, and advisory on regulatory and accounting standards, as well as valuation-related consultancy services related to mergers and acquisitions, initial public offerings, private placements, and others. It provides marketing and event organization, financing, property investment, and ESG and credit reporting services. The company is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.

8109.HK.summary: Kirin Group Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides insurance brokerage and money lending services in Hong Kong. The company operates through Insurance Brokerage and Related Service; Asset Management and Securities Brokerage Service; Money Lending Service; and Multi-Channel Network (MCN) Entertainment Business segments. It also offers advisory services, asset management services, and securities brokerage services, as well as consultancy and entertainment services. The company was formerly known as Creative Energy Solutions Holdings Limited and changed its name to Kirin Group Holdings Limited in July 2016. Kirin Group Holdings Limited is headquartered in Causeway Bay, Hong Kong.

8123.HK.summary: Sinofortune Financial Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the selling of motor vehicles and provision of agency services in the People's Republic of China and Hong Kong. The company offers securities and futures brokerage, and securities margin financing services; and precious metals spot trading and brokerage services. It also provides securities and futures contract trading and wealth management services; electronic trading platform; and stock information and analysis services. In addition, the company is involved in the trading and principal investment activities; and provision of education information and consultancy service. Further, it sells medicines, and calligraphy and painting. The company was formerly known as First China Financial Network Holdings Limited and changed its name to Sinofortune Financial Holdings Limited in June 2017. Sinofortune Financial Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

8168.HK.summary: Amasse Capital Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides corporate finance and investment advisory services in Hong Kong. The company offers financial advisory services to listed companies and investors seeking to control or invest in public listed companies, as well as independent board committees and/or independent shareholders of public listed companies. It also acts as an underwriter and/or placing agent not holding client assets in dealing activities for its clients. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Amasse Capital Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Access Cheer Limited.

8226.HK.summary: KOALA Financial Group Limited, an investment holding company, engages in securities brokerage, share placements, underwriting, and money lending activities in Hong Kong. The company operates in four segments: Securities Brokerage, Underwriting and Placements; Money Lending; Securities Investment; and Investment in Properties. It also leases investment properties and provides asset management services. The company was formerly known as Sunrise (China) Technology Group Limited and changed its name to KOALA Financial Group Limited in June 2017. KOALA Financial Group Limited is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.

8295.HK.long_name: Zhongjin Technology Services Group Company Limited
8295.HK.summary: Zhongjin Technology Services Group Company Limited, an investment holding company, provides corporate advisory services in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It also offers investment advisory and asset management, and proprietary investment services. The company also engages in securities dealing activities; and provision of investment funds. In addition, it offers various financing and financial advisory to corporate customers, such as issuance of bonds and preference shares, secondary market placement, issuance of convertible bonds, merger and acquisition financial advisory, and private placement services. Further, the company provides information technology outsourcing, data centre, and call centre solutions, as well as marketing services. The company was formerly known as ZZ Capital International Limited and changed its name to Zhongjin Technology Services Group Company Limited in April 2021. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Zhongjin Technology Services Group Company Limited is a subsidiary of Zhong Zhi Xin Zhuo Capital Company Limited.

8333.HK.summary: Astrum Financial Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides securities brokerage services in Hong Kong. It offers securities dealing and brokerage services; online brokerage services; placing and underwriting services; corporate finance advisory services; financing services, including securities and initial public offering financing; and asset management services, as well as futures contracts dealing services. The company was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Admiralty, Hong Kong. Astrum Financial Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Autumn Ocean Limited.

8340.HK.summary: Vinco Financial Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides various financial services in Hong Kong. The company offers its clients with initial public offerings (IPO) on the Main Board and GEM Board of The Stock Exchange of Hong Kong Limited; underwriting and distribution of IPO's shares; corporate finance advisory; mergers and acquisitions; corporate restructuring; arranging loan syndication; and convertible bonds issuance. It also facilitates corporate fund raising in equity capital market and debt market; provides professional advice on the structure of the fund raising; and assists private companies in pre-IPO private placement activities. In addition, the company advises clients on various transactions comprising fundraising activities of share placements, rights issues, and warrants issuance; share split/consolidation, privatization, and scheme of arrangement; capital restructuring; convertible bonds issuance; and formation of strategic partnership. Further, it acts as a financial advisor and independent financial advisor for transactions related to takeovers codes, connected transactions, and notifiable transactions; and as a financial advisor for corporate mergers and acquisitions, and asset and business acquisition/disposal transactions for listed and non-listed companies. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Vinco Financial Group Limited is a subsidiary of Vinco Asia Limited.

8350.HK.summary: Excalibur Global Financial Holdings Limited, through its subsidiaries, provides brokerage services for futures, securities, and options traded on the exchanges in Hong Kong, the United States, Japan, Singapore, and the United Kingdom. It also offers money lending and investment consulting services. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

8439.HK.summary: Somerley Capital Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides corporate finance advisory services in Hong Kong. The company acts as a financial adviser to Hong Kong public listed companies, various shareholders, and investors, as well as parties seeking to control or invest in listed companies in Hong Kong; and financial adviser to independent board committees and/or independent shareholders of listed companies in Hong Kong. It also acts as a compliance adviser primarily for newly listed companies in Hong Kong; a sponsor to initial public offerings and listings of shares of companies on the Stock Exchange in Hong Kong; and an advisor for the cross-border mergers and acquisitions, as well as provides advisory services on secondary equity issues and asset management services. The company offers advisory services related to takeovers of listed companies, acquisitions and disposals, connected transactions, spin-offs and reorganizations, privatizations, initial public offerings, and secondary issues. It serves the conglomerate, consumer, energy, natural resources and infrastructure, renewables, financial institutions and insurance, industrial, property and construction, gaming and hospitality, and TMT industries. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Somerley Capital Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Somerley Group Limited.

8657.HK.summary: True Partner Capital Holding Limited engages in the fund management business in Hong Kong and Chicago. The company manages funds and provides managed accounts on a discretionary basis using a proprietary trading platform. It also offers investment management, business consultancy, management, software sublicense, and training courses and seminar services, as well as software development and supporting services. In addition, the company develops and supports its trading platform and related software; and provides management services for a portfolio of securities or futures contracts. It manages funds of investors, including collective investment undertakings, family offices, pension funds, endowments/foundations, financial institutions, and high net worth individuals. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong.

93W.F.summary: Huarong International Financial Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides financial services in Hong Kong and the People's Republic of China. The company operates through Securities, Corporate Finance, and Asset Management and Direct Investment segments. The Securities segment engages in the broking and dealing of securities, futures, and options contracts; and provision of margin financing services. The Corporate Finance segment offers securities underwriting and sponsoring, and financial advisory services to institutional clients. The Asset Management and Direct Investment segment provides asset management services; and makes direct investments in equities, bonds, funds, derivative instruments, and other financial products. Huarong International Financial Holdings Limited also offers sub-leasing arrangement, money lending, and consultancy services. The company was formerly known as Simsen International Corporation Limited and changed its name to Huarong International Financial Holdings Limited in October 2015. The company is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Huarong International Financial Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Camellia Pacific Investment Holding Limited.

9AM1.F.summary: AMTD International Inc., an investment holding company, engages in investment banking activities in Hong Kong, Mainland China, the United States, and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Investment Banking, Asset Management, and Strategic Investment. It offers a range of investment banking services, including equity underwriting, debt underwriting, securities brokerage, institutional sales and distribution, and research, as well as advisory services on credit rating, financing, and mergers and acquisitions transactions. The company also provides professional investment management and advisory services primarily to corporate and other institutional clients. In addition, it makes long-term strategic investments focusing on Asia's financial and new economy sectors. The company was formerly known as AMTD Inc. AMTD International Inc. was incorporated in 2019 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. AMTD International Inc. is as subsidiary of AMTD Group Company Limited.

It intends to effect a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, recapitalization, reorganization, or other similar business combination with one or more businesses. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is based in Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong.

AAGIY.summary: AIA Group Limited provides insurance products and services. The company offers life, medical, accident protection, critical illness protection, and disability protection insurance products, as well as savings plans for individuals; and employee benefit, credit insurance, retirement, and regional solutions for businesses. It also distributes investment and other financial services products. The company distributes its products and services through agents and partners. It operates in Hong Kong, Macau, Thailand, Singapore, Brunei, Malaysia, Mainland China, Australia, New Zealand, Cambodia, Indonesia, Myanmar, the Philippines, South Korea, Sri Lanka, Taiwan, Vietnam, and India. AIA Group Limited was founded in 1919 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.

ABV Consulting, Inc. is a subsidiary of Kang Min Global Holdings Limited.

ADHG.summary: Ando Holdings Ltd., an investment holding company, provides financial services. It offers insurance planning services; and sells the insurance products. The company offers its services through an international equity assistance and information service platform. It also provides investment and corporate management consulting services. The company is based in Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong.

The company was incorporated in 2018 and is based in Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong.
